main event: An object described as a pencil shape that was bright star colored was observed traveling at a very high speed with a trail of light over Hunter AFB, GA.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 18 minutes, The object was moving on a northwest heading, The object had a tail trail of light at a 20-degree angle, The object hovered before the observers, The object's shape was specifically described as pencil-like.
sighted object: one pencil-shaped object with a bright star color
witness description: Capt. M.G. Wasil, pilot from the 347th Bomb Squadron
